contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=January 2007}} {{Infobox Album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Quiet Music 2 | Type = [[Album]] | Longtype = | Artist = [[Steve Roach (musician)|Steve Roach]] | Cover = Quiet_Music_2.jpg | Released = 1986 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Ambient music|Ambient]] | Length = 59:19 | Label = [[Fortuna Records]] | Producer = [[Steve Roach (musician)|Steve Roach]] | Reviews = | Last album = ''[[Empetus]]''<br/>(1986) | This album = '''''Quiet Music 2'''''<br/>(1986) | Next album = ''[[Quiet Music 3]]''<br/>(1986) }} '''''Quiet Music 2''''' (1986) is a [[Audio cassette|cassette]] album by the American [[Ambient music|ambient]] musician [[Steve Roach (musician)|Steve Roach]]. It is the slowest and most textural edition of the ''Quiet Music'' series. ==Track listing== #”See Things” – 5:44 #”Towards the Blue” – 3:17 #”Something in Tears” – 5:16 #”A Few More Moments” – 13:02 #”Air and Light” – 32:00 ==References== {{Reflist}} ==See also== *[[Steve Roach (musician)|Steve Roach]] *[[Ambient music]] *[[Electronic music]] {{Steve Roach}} [[Category:1986 albums]] [[Category:Steve Roach albums]]
